Rotation.RotationNotes:
>>> Works for minimum level characters! <<<
This is the profile you'll be using most of the time. It features "smart" applying and re-applying of dots on your target and focus targets to maximize cast and channel times while replicating how you would normally cast your priority list.
It will automatically apply Inner Fire, Shadowform, Vampiric Embrace if not present (while activated), use Dispersion at 5% mana and Arcane Torrent at 80% mana or bellow for most efficiency.
Hold your Right Alt key to cast Mass Dispel.
